name: The Hunt (itch) (Dr.Gunder_16)
description:
WASD - Move

F - Pick up item

After finding all 10 items you must also exit the store to win!

You were dared by a group of friends to obtain 10 items from an abandoned grocery store in a nearby town. There are rumors that the town is haunted so you must do this at night. Spend a little too much time in here and you may find that you are not alone...
